questions.question_text: Swāminārāyaṇah sākshād __________; Sarvebhyah paramām shāntim ānandam sukham arpayet.
options: Karoḍ rūpiyā kharachtā paṇ āvā Sādhu
questions.explanation: The shlok states: Swāminārāyaṇah sākshād Akshara-Purushottamaha; Sarvebhyah paramām shāntim ānandam sukham arpayet.

questions.question_text: Ā deh muktinu sādhan chhe, kevaḷ bhognu sādhan nathī. Durlabh ane nāshvant evo ā deh vāramvār maḷato nathī.
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 2.

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnu je ek __________ darshan te upar anant koṭi brahmānḍnā je viṣhaysukh chhe te sarvene vārīferīne nākhī deīe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: Bhagwānnu je ek nimiṣhmātranu darshan te upar anant koṭi brahmānḍnā je viṣhaysukh chhe te sarvene vārīferīne nākhī deīe.

questions.question_text: Viṣhaynu je sukh chhe te karatā ātmānu sukh bahu adhik chhe ne te karatā Bhagwānnu sukh e to chintāmaṇi chhe.
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Swamini Vato 1/26.

questions.question_text: Ā deh __________ mukter na bhoga-mātra-sādhanam; Durlabho nashvarash-chā'yam vāram-vāram na labhyate.
questions.explanation: The shlok states: Deho'yam sādhanam mukter na bhoga-mātra-sādhanam; Durlabho nashvarash-chā'yam vāram-vāram na labhyate.

questions.question_text: Karoḍ rūpiyā kharachtā paṇ āvā Sādhu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi; ne āpaṇe paṇ karoḍ janma dharyā chhe, paṇ koī vakhat āvo jog maḷyo nathī. Nīkar shu karavā deh dharavo paḍe?
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Swamini Vato 1/19.

questions.question_text: Ā dehe Bhagwānne bhajī levā, ne deh to hamaṇā paḍashe, māṭe ā to vījaḷīnā zabakārāmā __________ levu, tem thoḍāmā kām kāḍhī levu.
questions.explanation: The Swamini Vato states: Ā dehe Bhagwānne bhajī levā, ne deh to hamaṇā paḍashe, māṭe ā to vījaḷīnā zabakārāmā motī parovī levu, tem thoḍāmā kām kāḍhī levu.

questions.question_text: Swāminārāyaṇ Bhagwān eṭale ke sākṣhāt Akṣhar-Puruṣhottam Mahārāj sarvane param shānti, ānand ane sukh arpe.
questions.explanation: This quotation is the Gujarati translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 1.

questions.question_text: Karoḍ rūpiyā __________ paṇ āvā Sādhu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi.
questions.explanation: The Swamini Vato states: Karoḍ rūpiyā kharachtā paṇ āvā Sādhu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi.

questions.question_text: Ā deh muktinu sādhan chhe, kevaḷ bhognu sādhan nathī.
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 2.
